Title: Relates to authorizing the commissioner of health to restrict the use of trans fat in foods prepared by institutions under such department's jurisdiction
Summary: Authorizes the commissioner of health to restrict the use of trans fat in foods prepared by institutions under such department's jurisdiction; establishes reporting requirements.
LawCode: Amd ยง206, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to authorizing and directing the commissioner of health to adopt rules and regulations requiring the restriction or elimination of the use of trans fat in institutions under its jurisdiction
